wiki.summary: “Takeaway” is a collaboration between American DJ and production duo The Chainsmokers and American musician Illenium, featuring Lennon Stella as a vocalist. The song name was accidentally revealed by The Chainsmokers through an Instagram story in February 2018. The original snippet of the song, with Sorana having the female vocals, was played live at Ultra Miami 2019 during the closing performance from the Chainsmokers, and Illenium was brought on stage to help debut it live. wiki.content: “Takeaway” is a collaboration between American DJ and production duo The Chainsmokers and American musician Illenium, featuring Lennon Stella as a vocalist. The song name was accidentally revealed by The Chainsmokers through an Instagram story in February 2018. The original snippet of the song, with Sorana having the female vocals, was played live at Ultra Miami 2019 during the closing performance from the Chainsmokers, and Illenium was brought on stage to help debut it live. However the finalised and extended version played later at Ultra Europe 2019 replaced Sorana with Lennon Stella, who will be supporting The Chainsmokers on their upcoming World War Joy tour. On July 17, the track, and its subsequent music video, was teased. "hahaha we were super excited about this one, this is a song [w]e had been working on for a while but both of us just kept getting distracted so we set ultra as the finish date so we could actually get it done and we made it happen, but we had no idea how a song like this premiered for the firs[t] time at mainstage would go over… well it seems like overall you guys loved and are very excited so we are gonna finish it up and get it out asap! and for the record working with nick has been awesome!" – The Chainsmokers in a Reddit comment "This track is out because of you guys. I know artists say cheesy things like that all the time but to be honest we hadn’t planned on releasing this until we previewed at Ultra and our comment section turned into requests for this to come out. Just want to let you know we hear you guys, we love you guys, we are so grateful to have you here with us. If you love this song please tag someone that needs to hear it! @illeniummusic @lennonstella" – The Chainsmokers in an Instagram post During the week ending August 10, 2019, “Takeaway” debuted and peaked at #69 on the Hot 100. Takeaway’s music video was shot at The Vessel in New York City. The landmark recently opened in March of 2019. "not to mention it was super bad ass to have the vessel serve as our set location which is such an impressive structure to see in person. definitely go check it out if you’re in NYC" – The Chainsmokers talking about the Vessel in a reddit comment It was certified platinum by the RIAA on June 29, 2020. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
